Uses of Class
io.netty.channel.ChannelOutboundByteHandlerAdapter

  • Packages that use ChannelOutboundByteHandlerAdapter 
    Package Description
    io.netty.handler.codec
    Extensible decoder and its common implementations which deal with the packet fragmentation and reassembly issue found in a stream-based transport such as TCP/IP.
    io.netty.handler.codec.compression
    Encoder and decoder which compresses and decompresses ByteBufs in a compression format such as zlib, gzip, and Snappy.
    io.netty.handler.codec.sctp
    Decoder and encoders to manage message completion and multi-streaming codec in SCTP/IP.

    • Uses of ChannelOutboundByteHandlerAdapter in io.netty.handler.codec

      Subclasses of ChannelOutboundByteHandlerAdapter in io.netty.handler.codec 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ByteToByteEncoder
      ChannelOutboundByteHandlerAdapter which encodes bytes in a stream-like fashion from one ByteBuf to an other.

    • Uses of ChannelOutboundByteHandlerAdapter in io.netty.handler.codec.compression

      Subclasses of ChannelOutboundByteHandlerAdapter in io.netty.handler.codec.compression 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  JdkZlibEncoder
      Compresses a ByteBuf using the deflate algorithm.
      class  JZlibEncoder
      Compresses a ByteBuf using the deflate algorithm.
      class  SnappyFramedEncoder
      Compresses a ByteBuf using the Snappy framing format.
      class  ZlibEncoder
      Compresses a ByteBuf using the deflate algorithm.

    • Uses of ChannelOutboundByteHandlerAdapter in io.netty.handler.codec.sctp

      Subclasses of ChannelOutboundByteHandlerAdapter in io.netty.handler.codec.sctp 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  SctpOutboundByteStreamHandler
      A ChannelHandler which transform ByteBuf to SctpMessage and send it through a specific stream with given protocol identifier.
